title: Touched by a Dom
description: Sir Kyle’s need for pain terrifies all but the kinkiest submissives. The willing screams of his subs ring through the walls of Club El Diable.Trisha is new to the BDSM lifestyle and has never experienced the big “O” with a man. Her vibrator does the job better than her last boyfriend so who needs more? Kyle’s dark secret keeps him from training new subs but he’s hot to test Trisha’s limits.Can Trisha survive the painful ecstasy Kyle administers when she’s Touched by a Dom?
author: Holly S. Roberts
